pages.text: Cave centipedes are big and log arthropods with a head mostly of puprple color, along with powerful mandibles while the rest of the body is black, but the antenna and legs are an red color$(br2)They are hostile and strong creatures but they are slow too. Don't let it bite you! Or you will be afflicted by a powerfull Posion II for 10 seconds

On death, Cave Centipedes can drop of their legs.$(br2)It can be used with Komodo Dragon Spit or Poisonous Essence to create a $(l:patchouli:potions/alexsmobs/poison_resistance)Potion of Poison Resistance$(/l).$(br2)You can use it to create the $(l:patchouli:armors/cave_centipede_leggings)Cave Centipede Leggings$(/l) too that grant the ability to climb blocks.
